response.overview: Vodou Priestess Katy calls on the spirits at a traditional Haitian Vodou ceremony of the Dead. Attend her first ceremony since being displaced after the 2010 earthquake. Broadly travels to the heart of Port-au-Prince, Haiti to join Priestess Katy as she fills her community with the spiritual healing power of a traditional Vodou ceremony, captured for the first time ever in virtual reality. Six years after the 2010 earthquake, which killed more than 160,000 and left over one million people without a home, Haiti has struggled to rehabilitate itself. Broadly teams up with Academy Award nominated director, Lucy Walker in search of healing in Haiti.
response.title: The Vodou Healer
